comment: c/c There are obvious foreign trolls on Gab, posing as White Nationalists & Trump supporters. They are currently trying to sow division, demoralize conservative voters, spreading anti-Trump/anti-Republican propaganda, and discouraging people from voting. This is foreign election interference. Will Gab do anything about this?
amr:
# ::snt c/c There are obvious foreign trolls on Gab, posing as White Nationalists & Trump supporters. They are currently trying to sow division, demoralize conservative voters, spreading anti-Trump/anti-Republican propaganda, and discouraging people from voting. This is foreign election interference. Will Gab do anything about this?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt2 (t / try-01
            :ARG0 (t2 / they)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (s / sow-01
                        :ARG0 t2
                        :ARG1 (d / divide-02))
                  :op2 (d2 / demoralize-01
                        :ARG0 t2
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :mod (c / conservative)
                              :ARG0-of (v / vote-01)))
                  :op3 (s2 / spread-03
                        :ARG0 t2
                        :ARG1 (p2 / propaganda
                              :ARG0-of (o / oppose-01
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (p3 / person
                                                :name (n / name
                                                      :op1 "Trump"))
                                          :op2 (p4 / person
                                                :ARG0-of (o2 / oppose-01
                                                      :ARG1 (p5 / political-party
                                                            :name (n2 / name
                                                                  :op1 "Republican")))))))
                        :op4 (d3 / discourage-01
                              :ARG0 t2
                              :ARG1 (p6 / person)
                              :ARG2 (v2 / vote-01
                                    :ARG0 p6))))
            :time (c2 / current))
      :snt3 (ii / interfere-01
            :ARG0 (e / elect-01
                  :mod (f / foreign))
            :ARG1 (t3 / this)
            :polarity (a3 / amr-unknown))
      :snt4 (d4 / do-02
            :ARG0 (p7 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Gab"))
            :ARG1 (a4 / anything)
            :ARG2 (t4 / this)))

comment: Hopefully no. We don't need any echo chambers. If your ideology can't withstand a little shit posting, then your ideology is trash! You political rivals will throw everything they can at you, and it will be you looking like an NPC if all you can do is spout buzzwords.
amr:
# ::snt Hopefully no. We don't need any echo chambers. If your ideology can't withstand a little shit posting, then your ideology is trash! You political rivals will throw everything they can at you, and it will be you looking like an NPC if all you can do is spout buzzwords.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hope-01
            :ARG1 (n / no))
      :snt2 (n2 / need-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (c / chamber
                  :mod (e / echo)
                  :mod (a / any)))
      :snt3 (t / trash
            :domain (ii / ideology
                  :poss (y / you))
            :condition (p / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (w2 / withstand-01
                        :ARG0 (ii2 / ideology
                              :poss y)
                        :ARG1 (p2 / post-01
                              :ARG1 (s / shit
                                    :mod (l / little))))))
      :snt4 (a2 / and
            :op1 (t2 / throw-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (r / rival-01
                              :ARG1 y
                              :mod (p4 / politics)))
                  :ARG1 (e2 / everything
                        :ARG1-of (p5 / possible-01))
                  :ARG2 (y2 / you))
            :op2 (l2 / look-02
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (n3 / NPC))
            :condition (p6 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (d / do-02
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 (s2 / spout-01
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :ARG1 (b / buzzword))
                        :mod (a3 / all)))))
